Debian packages for gerbv (release greater than potato)

Download the necessary files (*.dsc, *diff.gz, *.orig.tar.gz). Then follow these steps:
  • Run dkpg-source -x <current relase>.dsc
  • cd to the newly generated directory.
  • Run dkpg-buildpackage
  • In .. you now have a .deb-file. Run dpkg --install on that file.

Releases

  • gerbv 0.0.3
    • gerbv_0.0.3-1.diff.gz
    • gerbv_0.0.3-1.dsc
    • gerbv_0.0.3.orig.tar.gz
